Articles.Content:
Okay, so we all know that 0.24 is going to out pretty soon-and most likely, it will be awsome. BUT. It's going to break mods. So I figured we should make a list of the ones we think (or know) are likely to break, so people know which ones could be save killers after the update, and are going to need to be updated.

My current thoughts are that the most complex plugins and such will be most likely to go. If one like module manager or RPM that several mods are dependant on go, that's going to cause an awfull lot to fail. But I'm not a modder-so I can't say beyond this.

So, what do you think?

Parts mods are unlikely to totally break. If their prices aren't set right, they may be awkward in career mode. Unless of course as you say they are dependent on things like Module Manager and Firespitter (not sure what RPM is, guess I don't use that one) Plugin mods are kind of up in the air, they may or may not break... too hard to say without trying it.
This thread is rather pointless - how would anyone outside of QA and experimentals know which mods are going to break? Just wait and see. Then again wait some more and download the updated mods.

Parts mods are unlikely to totally break. If their prices aren't set right, they may be awkward in career mode. Unless of course as you say they are dependent on things like Module Manager and Firespitter (not sure what RPM is, guess I don't use that one) Plugin mods are kind of up in the air, they may or may not break... too hard to say without trying it.

RPM=Raster Prop Monitor. If you dont know what that is, check it out-it does some really cool stuff

As for this thread being pointless-well maybe, but isn't speculating on 0.24 in general probably pointless untill release?
